property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever a card is added to your shields, this creature doesn't leave the battle zone until the start of your next turn. ■ Whenever a card leaves your shield zone, untap this creature.

property.name: Race
property.value: Judgment Emblem Z

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SABAKI Z} (When a Judgment Emblem is added to your hand from your shields, you may discard that card. If you do, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on one of your shields face up instead. (The stack is still considered one shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-07 Messiah Calibur Z-Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, put one of your shields into your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-07 Messiah Calibur Z-Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a card is put into your shield zone, choose one of your opponent's creature and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-07 Messiah Calibur Z-Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Race
property.value: Judgment Emblem

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a spell or a Metallica from among them, show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on top of one of your shields face up instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-07 Messiah Calibur Z-Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Race
property.value: Judgment Emblem

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw a card. ■ After you cast this spell from your hand, put it on top of one of your shields face up instead of your graveyard. (The stack is still considered one shield.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-07 Messiah Calibur Z-Explosion Start Deck

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a card is added to your shields, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)
